text: George Bizos (14 November 1927 â€“ 9 September 2020) was a Greek-born South African human rights lawyer. He campaigned against apartheid in South Africa, most notably during the Rivonia Trial. He was Nelson Mandela's lawyer. Bizos died in Johannesburg on 9 September 2020, aged 92.Human rights advocate George Bizos has died ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:South African businesspeople Category:South African lawyers Category:South African activists Category:South African autobiographers
